posts.post_title: For Sale: TONS OF T206!! Cobb, Wajo, Young, SL OMs
posts.post_content:
Tons of cards for sale here!
I finally compiled my albums (pictures front and back) and updated my sale list.
[url]https://www.flickr.com/photos/187209455@N02/albums[/url]

I am entertaining offers.

Shoot me an email for the price list 6.0 (I cant seem to find a way to attach it - the file is a PDF but still to large I guess)
[url]derekalonzi@gmail.com[/url]

bresnahan PSA 3? Mcgraw PSA 2? Clarke with bat SGC 2? Just emailed you, just saw that you could not attach prices.

Thanks ! mike
Hey Mike, I didnt get an email. Atleast Im not sure, I have gotten tons of messages. Would you send it again if you didnt receive a response.

It got kicked back for some reason, can you please email me:

[url]vermont2500@hotmail.com[/url]

thanks, mike
Email sent.  BTW  your email link is misspelled so it gets kicked back.  May want to edit.

Would like the del Howard what is the pricing? Thanks 
Dean
